title: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it in Photon theme
description: When attempting to click on the first Combo, it does not take focus. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus. This issue is specific to the Photon theme.
OB: When I click on the first Combo, it does not take focus. It only takes focus when I drop down the combo list.
EB: When I click on the first Combo, it should take focus.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the application in the Photon theme. 2. Find the first Combo. 3. Click on the first Combo and observe that it does not take focus. 4. Drop down the combo list and observe that it now takes focus.
